resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157529</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157529</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1225</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ezra and the Vanishing Jews: A Webquest about Jewish Integration and Assimilation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ezra und die verschwindenen Juden: Ein 
Webquest über jüdische Integration und Assimilation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ezra et les juifs d'disparaition : Un 
Webquest au sujet de l'intégration et de l'assimilation juives</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ezra e os jews desaparecendo: Um Webquest 
sobre a integração e o assimilation jewish</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ezra e gli ebrei di sparizione: Un Webquest
circa integrazione ed assimilazione ebree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ezra και οι εξαφανιμένος Εβραίοι: Ένα 
Webquest για την εβραϊκές ολοκλήρωση και την αφομοίωση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ezra y los judíos de desaparición: Un 
Webquest sobre la integración y la asimilación judías</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This webquest will explore many of the underlying challenges facing each of the primary Jewish groups today, and attempt to find ways to address this central problem affecting our entire nation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Intermarriage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Assimilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser webquest Wille erforschen viele der 
zugrundeliegenden Herausforderungen, die heute jede der jüdischen 
hauptsächlichgruppen gegenüberstellen und versuchen, Wege zu finden,
dieses zentrale Problem zu adressieren, das unsere gesamte Nation 
beeinflußt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette volonté webquest explorent plusieurs des 
défis fondamentaux faisant face à chacun des groupes juifs primaires
aujourd'hui, et essayent de trouver des moyens d'adresser ce problème
central affectant notre nation entière.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta vontade a mais webquest explora muitos dos 
desafios subjacentes que enfrentam cada um dos grupos jewish 
preliminares hoje, e tenta encontrar maneiras dirigir-se a este 
problema central que afeta nossa nação inteira.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa volontà più webquest esplora molte delle
sfide di fondo che affrontano oggi ciascuno dei gruppi ebrei primari
e tenta di trovare i modi richiamare questo problema centrale che 
interessa la nostra intera nazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό to πιό ωεψquεστο θα ερευνήσει πολλές από τις 
ελλοχεύουσες προκλήσεις που απασχολούν κάθε μια από τις αρχικές 
εβραϊκές ομάδες σήμερα, και θα προσπαθήσει να βρεί τους τρόπους
να εξεταστεί αυτό το κεντρικό πρόβλημα που έχει επιπτώσεις στο 
ολόκληρο έθνος μας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta voluntad ma's webquest explora muchos de los
desafíos subyacentes que hacen frente a cada uno de los grupos 
judíos primarios hoy, y procura encontrar maneras de tratar este 
problema central que afecta nuestra nación entera.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Intermarriage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Assimilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Judentum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mariage consanguin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Assimilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Intermarriage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Assimilation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intermarriage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Assimilazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιγαμία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφομοίωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">judaism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intermarriage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Asimilación</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">judaísmo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
